x-codeSamples.source:
import java.net.*;
import java.net.http.*;
import java.util.*;

public class App {
  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
    var httpClient = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
    var payload = String.join("\n"
"{"
,"  \"mobileNumber\": \"string\","
,"  \"email\": \"string\","
,"  \"browserType\": \"string\","
,"  \"whatsappType\": \"string\","
,"  \"parameterCount\": \"int32\","
,"  \"templateName\": \"string\","
,"  \"templateId\": \"string\","
,"  \"params\": ["
,"    \"string_1\","
,"    \"string_2\""
,"  ],"
,"  \"mediaType\": \"string\","
,"  \"mediaUrl\": \"string\","
,"  \"button1\": \"string\","
,"  \"button2\": \"string\","
,"  \"button3\": \"string\","
,"  \"buttons\": ["
,"    "{""
,"      \"buttonType\": \"string\","
,"      \"buttonPayload\": \"string\""
,"    "}""
,"  ],"
,"  \"button_type\": \"string\","
,"  \"button_payload\": \"string\","
,"  \"fileName\": \"string\","
,"  \"contentType\": \"string\","
,"  \"template\": "{""
,"    \"language\": "{""
,"      \"policy\": \"string\","
,"      \"code\": \"string\""
,"    "}","
,"    \"templateId\": \"string\""
,"  "}","
,"  \"components\": ["
,"    "{""
,"      \"type\": \"string\","
,"      \"mediaparameters\": ["
,"        "{""
,"          \"type\": \"string\","
,"          \"media\": "{""
,"            \"type\": \"string\","
,"            \"url\": \"string\","
,"            \"filename\": \"string\""
,"          "}""
,"        "}""
,"      ]"
,"    "}""
,"  ],"
,"  \"message\": \"string\","
,"  \"to's\": \"string\","
,"  \"from's\": \"string\""
,"}"
    );
    

    var host = "https://{host-domain}";
    var pathname = "/whatsapp/api/v1/single";
    var request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
      .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(payload))
      .uri(URI.create(host + pathname ))
      .header("Content-Type", "value").header("Host", "value")
      .build();

    var response = httpClient.send(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());

    System.out.println(response.body());
  }
}

Save Your Carousel Of Cards Template that you want to send with unique intent.
There Are 6 Different types of suggestions
  • text_suggestion
  • url_suggestion
  • dial_suggestion
  • view_location_suggestion
  • share_location_suggestion
  • calender_event_suggestion

x-codeSamples.source:
import java.net.*;
import java.net.http.*;
import java.util.*;

public class App {
  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
    var httpClient = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
    var payload = String.join("\n"
"{"
,"  \"cards\": ["
,"    "{""
,"      \"suggestions\": "{""
,"        \"text_suggestion\": ["
,"          "{""
,"            \"display_text\": \"string\","
,"            \"postback_reply\": \"string\""
,"          "}""
,"        ],"
,"        \"url_suggestion\": ["
,"          "{""
,"            \"display_text\": \"string\","
,"            \"postback_reply\": \"string\","
,"            \"url\": \"uri\""
,"          "}""
,"        ],"
,"        \"dial_suggestion\": ["
,"          "{""
,"            \"display_text\": \"string\","
,"            \"postback_reply\": \"string\","

x-codeSamples.source:
import java.net.*;
import java.net.http.*;
import java.util.*;

public class App {
  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
    var httpClient = HttpClient.newBuilder().build();
    var payload = String.join("\n"
"{"
,"  \"sms_agent\": "{""
,"    \"type\": \"otp\","
,"    \"sender_id\": \"string\","
,"    \"sms_type\": \"TEXT\","
,"    \"template\": \"string\","
,"    \"temp_id\": \"string\","
,"    \"priority\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}","
,"    \"second_attempt\": true"
,"  "}","
,"  \"whatsapp_agent\": "{""
,"    \"type\": \"otp\","
,"    \"template_name\": \"string\","
,"    \"params\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}","
,"    \"priority\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}""
,"  "}","
,"  \"email_agent\": "{""
,"    \"type\": \"otp\","
,"    \"from_email\": \"email\","
,"    \"from_name\": \"string\","
,"    \"email_subject\": \"string\","
,"    \"template\": \"string\","
,"    \"priority\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}""
,"  "}","
,"  \"rcs_agent\": "{""
,"    \"type\": \"otp\","
,"    \"template_name\": \"string\","
,"    \"template_type\": \"simple_message\","
,"    \"params\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}","
,"    \"priority\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}""
,"  "}","
,"  \"obd_agent\": "{""
,"    \"type\": \"otp\","
,"    \"callerId\": \"string\","
,"    \"access_key\": \"string\","
,"    \"template\": \"string\","
,"    \"priority\": "{""
,"      \"object\": \"object_value\""
,"    "}""
,"  "}","
,"  \"template_name\": \"string\""
,"}"
    );
    

    var host = "{{API_URL}}";
    var pathname = "/2FA/v1/template/";
    var request = HttpRequest.newBuilder()
      .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(payload))
      .uri(URI.create(host + pathname ))
      .header("Content-Type", "value").header("Authorization", "value")
      .build();

    var response = httpClient.send(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());

    System.out.println(response.body());
  }
}
